price: Vërtet, çdonjëri prej tyre kërkon që t’i jepen shkrime të hapura (nga Zoti).
arabic: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: bal yurīdu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yu'tā ṣuḥufan munasharatan
